title: Trooping the colour, 1964
brief_description: Newsreel magazine recording the Trooping the Colour ceremony in 1964. Contains footage of Queen Elizabeth II leaving Buckingham Palace on horse to attend the ceremony and appearing on the balcony with 3 month-old Prince Edward and other members of the Royal family at the end of the ceremony. Provides a detailed description and explanation of this famous ceremony.
